text: Mad Families is a 2017 American comedy film directed by Fred Wolf, and starring Charlie Sheen, Leah Remini and Charlotte McKinney. The film is an original production by Crackle. The film also marks the final film appearance of Naya Rivera, who died on July 8, 2020 in a drowning accident. == Plot == Three families compete for a camping spot during a busy fourth of July holiday weekend. == Cast == *Charlie Sheen as Charlie Jones *Leah Remini as Cheyenne *Charlotte McKinney as Sharni *Clint Howard as Gravy *Tiffany Haddish as Keko *Naya Rivera as Felipa *Dennis Quaid as Head Ranger *Chanel Iman as Shantaysia *Efren Ramirez as Rolando *Chris Mulkey as Tommy *Mason Vale Cotton as Chuckie *Naomi Kyle as Ranger Kelly *Barry Shabaka Henley as Pops *Juan Gabriel Pareja as Jose Jonas *Finesse Mitchell as Franklin *Danny Mora as Mr. Jonas *Ashley James as Francesca *Lil Rel Howery as Ron Ron *PJ Hubbard as Ron Ron Jr *Hash Patel as Indian dad *Aamya Deva Keroles as Lettie *Justice Alan as Rolando Jr *Antonio Lewis Todd as Ranger Tony *Amanda Christine as Ron Ron Kid 2 *Sara Fiona Wolf as Sara *Clyde Yasuhara as Chinese Dad == References == == External links == * * * Category:2017 films Category:2017 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:English- language films Category:Films directed by Fred Wolf Category:Films scored by J. Peter Robinson Category:Independence Day (United States) films Category:Films with screenplays by David Spade Category:Films with screenplays by Fred Wolf
title: Mad Families
